author: Luc Olinga
title: Crypto Is on Fire as Bitcoin Nears $120K in Unstoppable Surge
description: Fueled by Trump’s pressure on the Fed and a tidal wave of investor optimism, the world’s most famous cryptocurrency is on an unstoppable run.
content:
Bitcoin is surging once again. And this time, the climb feels different.
The world’s largest cryptocurrency continued its dizzying ascent on Friday, smashing through multiple symbolic price threshol… [+3771 chars]
